sen.j: 二階堂 行忠（にかいどう ゆきただ、1221年（承久3年） - 1290年12月24日（正応3年11月21日 (旧暦)））は、二階堂行盛の子で鎌倉幕府の政所執事。
sen.e: Yukitada NIKAIDO (1221 - December 24, 1290) was a child of Yukimori NIKAIDO and Mandokoro Shitsuji (chief of Mandokoro, the Administrative Board) of the Kamakura bakufu.
Yukitada NIKAIDO (1221 - December 24, 1290) was a child of Yukimori NIKAIDO and Mandokoro Shitsuji (chief of Mandokoro, the Administrative Board) of the Kamakura bakufu.

sen.j: 『吾妻鏡』1222年（貞応元年）9月21日条に「籐民部大夫行盛の妻男子平産す」とあるのが行忠である。
sen.e: In the article dated September 21, 1222,of "Azuma Kagami", 'the wife of Tominbu no taifu Yukitada gave birth to a son'.
sen.cmt: 籐民部大夫はTominbu no taifuとしました。
sen.e: The article dated September 21, 1222 of "Azuma Kagami" described that, 'the wife of Tominbu no taifu Yukitada gave birth to a son,' which indicated Yukitada.
sen.cmt: 「のがあるのが行忠である」が訳出されていなかったため、文章全体を再訳しました。
sen.e: The article dated September 21, 1222 of "Azuma Kagami" described that, 'the wife of Tominbu no taifu Yukitada gave birth to a son,' which indicated Yukitada.

sen.j: 政所執事は代々主に二階堂行盛の子孫が世襲している。
sen.e: Mandokoro Shitsuji was mainly inherited by descendents of Yukimori NIKAIDO.
Mandokoro Shitsuji was mainly inherited by descendents of Yukimori NIKAIDO.
Mandokoro Shitsuji was mainly inherited by descendents of Yukimori NIKAIDO.

sen.j: 最初は二階堂行泰が継ぎ、その後その子二階堂行頼、二階堂行実が政所執事を継ぐがそれぞれ早死にする。
sen.e: First Yukiyasu, and then his sons, Yukiyori NIKAIDO and Yukizane NIKAIDO, inherited Mandokoro Shitsuji, but they died young.
sen.cmt: 二階堂行頼はYukiyori NIKAIDO、二階堂行実はYukizane NIKAIDOとしました。
sen.e: First Yukiyasu, and then his sons, Yukiyori NIKAIDO and Yukizane NIKAIDO, inherited Mandokoro Shitsuji, but they died young.

sen.j: その後政所執事を継いだ行泰の弟の二階堂行綱の家でもその子二階堂頼綱が政所執事を継いで2年後に死去したため、政所執事の職には当時評定衆であったその叔父・行忠が63歳という高齢で就任することになる。
sen.e: Yukutsuna NIKAIDO, a brother of Yukiyasu, inherited Mandokoro Shitsuji, but his son, Yoritsuna NIKAIDO, died two years after inheriting it, his uncle, Yukitada, who was hyojoshu (a member of Council of State), became Mandokoro Shitsuji at the age of 63.
sen.cmt: 二階堂頼綱はYoritsuna NIKAIDOとしました。
sen.e: Yukutsuna NIKAIDO, a brother of Yukiyasu, inherited Mandokoro Shitsuji, but his son, Yoritsuna NIKAIDO, died two years after inheriting it, his uncle, so Yukitada, who was hyojoshu (a member of Council of State), became Mandokoro Shitsuji at the ripe old age of 63.
sen.cmt: "so"を挿入しました（文法的に）「高齢で」が訳出されていなかったため、"the ripe old (age of 63)"としました。
sen.e: Yukutsuna NIKAIDO, a brother of Yukiyasu, inherited Mandokoro Shitsuji, but his son, Yoritsuna NIKAIDO, died two years after inheriting it, his uncle, so Yukitada, who was hyojoshu (a member of Council of State), became Mandokoro Shitsuji at the ripe old age of 63.

sen.j: 行忠の嫡子・二階堂行宗は引付衆まで進んだが行忠より早く没しており、行忠の没後は孫の二階堂行貞が22歳で政所執事に就任した。
sen.e: Yukimune NIKAIDO, a legitimate child of Yukitada, became Hikitsukeshu (Coadjustor of the High Court), but died earlier than Yukitada, and after the death of Yukitada, his grandson Yukisada NIKAIDO was assigned to Mandokoro Shitsuji at the age of 22.
sen.cmt: 二階堂行宗はYukimune NIKAIDOとしました。
